trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Reset-ComputerMachinePassword
trans-unit.target: Reset-ComputerMachinePassword

trans-unit.source: Reset-ComputerMachinePassword
trans-unit.target: Reset-ComputerMachinePassword

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Resets the machine account password for the computer.
trans-unit.target: 重置计算机的计算机帐户密码。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The **Reset-ComputerMachinePassword** cmdlet changes the computer account password that the computers use to authenticate to the domain controllers in the domain.
trans-unit.target: **Reset-computermachinepassword** cmdlet 更改计算机用于向域中的域控制器进行身份验证的计算机帐户密码。

trans-unit.source: You can use it to reset the password of the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用它重置本地计算机的密码。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Reset the password for the local computer
trans-unit.target: 示例 1︰ 重置本地计算机的密码

trans-unit.source: This command resets the computer password for the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将本地计算机的计算机密码重置。

trans-unit.source: The command runs with the credentials of the current user.
trans-unit.target: 该命令使用当前用户的凭据运行。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Reset the password for the local computer by using a specified domain controller
trans-unit.target: 示例 2︰ 通过使用指定的域控制器重置本地计算机的密码

trans-unit.source: This command resets the computer password of the local computer by using the DC01 domain controller.
trans-unit.target: 此命令通过使用域控制器 DC01 重置本地计算机的计算机密码。

trans-unit.source: It uses the *Credential* parameter to specify a user account that has permission to reset a computer password in the domain.
trans-unit.target: 它使用 *凭据* 参数来指定有权重置计算机密码的域中的用户帐户。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Reset the password on a remote computer
trans-unit.target: 示例 3︰ 将远程计算机上的密码重置

trans-unit.source: This command uses the Invoke-Command cmdlet to run a **Reset-ComputerMachinePassword** command on the Server01 remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令使用 Invoke-command cmdlet 运行 **Reset-computermachinepassword** 命令在 Server01 远程计算机上。

trans-unit.source: For more information about remote commands in Windows PowerShell, see about_Remote and **Invoke-Command**.
trans-unit.target: 有关 Windows PowerShell 中远程命令的详细信息，请参阅 about_Remote 和 **Invoke-command**。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。

trans-unit.source: -Credential
trans-unit.target: -Credential

trans-unit.source: Specifies a user account that has permission to perform this action.
trans-unit.target: 指定有权执行此操作的用户帐户。

trans-unit.source: The default is the current user.
trans-unit.target: 默认为当前用户。

trans-unit.source: Type a user name, such as User01 or Domain01\User01, or enter a **PSCredential** object, such as one generated by the Get-Credential cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 键入用户名，例如 User01 或 Domain01\User01，或输入 **PSCredential** 对象，例如由 Get-credential cmdlet 生成。

trans-unit.source: If you type a user name, this cmdlet prompts you for a password.
trans-unit.target: 如果键入用户名，则此 cmdlet 会提示您输入密码。

trans-unit.source: This parameter was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 已在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入了此参数。

trans-unit.source: -Server
trans-unit.target: 服务器

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of a domain controller to use when this cmdlet sets the computer account password.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用此 cmdlet 设置了计算机帐户密码时的域控制器的名称。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is optional.
trans-unit.target: 该参数为可选参数。

trans-unit.source: If you omit this parameter, a domain controller is chosen to service the command.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则将选择域控制器来处理该命令。

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 显示如果运行 cmdlet 则会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmdlet 不会运行。显示在 cmdlet 运行时，会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: cmdlet 未运行。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: You cannot pipe input to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 不能通过管道将输入传递给此 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 将不生成任何输出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相关的链接
